titles.title: Federal Courts Access Act of 2019
Federal Courts Access Act of 2019
A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to modify the amount in controversy requirement and remove the complete diversity requirement.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Federal Courts Access Act of 2019
This bill revises the statutory requirements for federal court jurisdiction in cases involving diversity of citizenship.
